survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from patients regarding their recent healthcare experiences to improve service quality and patient care.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with your recent healthcare visit?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measurable satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.
